        Throws:

      • changeRoom

        public void changeRoom(int scheduleId,
              int roomId)
                throws java.sql.SQLException,
                       PlanningException
        This room modification affects only the selected schedule. This occurs for exemple on studio-type schedules.
        Parameters:
        scheduleId -
        roomId - new room id
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • changeTeacherForSchedule

        public void changeTeacherForSchedule(ScheduleObject orig,
                            ScheduleObject range,
                            DateFr date)
                              throws PlanningException
        Changes the teacher on selected schedule.
        Parameters:
        orig - initial schedule
        range - replacement schedule
        date - start date
        Throws:
        PlanningException

      • changeTeacher

        public void changeTeacher(ScheduleObject orig,
                 ScheduleObject range,
                 DateFr start,
                 DateFr end)
                   throws PlanningException
        Changes the teacher between 2 dates. If range has not changed,the modification is made for all schedules between 2 dates, else the modification is made only for the selected schedule. Changes may apply on only one part of schedule. In this case, it is necessary to create another planning with same action id.
        Parameters:
        orig - initial schedule
        start - date start
        end - date end
        range - replacement schedule
        Throws:
        PlanningException, - SQLException
        PlanningException
